description: A classic Sicilian almond brittle that is easy to prepare and delicious.
keywords: Confectionery,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Minnulata Siciliana (Sicilian Almond Brittle) Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: In a frypan on low heat toast almonds until lightly golden brown.
Transfer toasted almonds to a medium saucepan on low heat add sugar and vanilla essence, mix well.
As soon as the sugar liquifies and turns into light dark colour, transfer mixture to either a greased slab of marble or baking paper.
With another piece of greased baking paper press down the mixture.
Using a rolling pin smooth out mixture and remove baking paper.
While still warm proceed to cut into pieces and serve. Enjoy!
